_header: Of serving men I will begin
Note: See 2407; ‘Troly, loley’ refrain is 2nd and 4th line of each stanza.
Subjects: servants, praise of; carols, amorous; women, as speakers/narrators
_description: In Praise of Serving Men — eight quatrains (abab) and 4-line burden: ‘So well ys me begone / Troly lole’ (repeated)
